title: Installation date information is made available through the POT API
description:
Description
POT shall provide additional appointment information for its consumers. The appointment information is made available through standard TMF data structures for appointments. The information is available as values. The appointment information includes:
Inspection date
Building connection date
GF-TA installation date
The information is available for consumers by events and synchronous calls.
acceptance_criteria: Inspection date (Besichtigungsdatum) is available through the POT API
GF-TA installation date if is available through the POT API
Building connection date (Hausanschluss) is available through the POT API
